project_descr: Social Protection Policy Support - Project Aims to address the needs of the country’s most vulnerable groups through re-thinking on the direction, scope and design of social protection

outputs.output_descr: The  Social Protection Policy Support Programme responds to deficiencies in the existing social protection system and a need for system  reconfiguration. It will draw on the National Social Protection Strategy,
